definition: abbr. for 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 Da4 xue2]
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
magnificent/splendid/flowery
old variant of 花[hua1]/flower
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
abbr. for China
Tsinghua or Qinghua University, Beijing/National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan

sentences.english: After the War of Resistance Against Japan, Tsinghua University was removed from Kunming to Beiping in 1946.
sentences.chinese: 清华大学在抗战胜利后的1946年由昆明迁回北平。

sentences.english: The largest group was from Tsinghua University.
sentences.chinese: 其中最大的代表团来自于清华大学。

sentences.english: I don't advise you to go to Tsinghua.
Jibing Chen got both Bachelor's and Master degree from Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics.
sentences.chinese: 他在清华大学获得自动化专业学士和硕士学位。

sentences.english: He is reading electron physics at Qinghua University.
sentences.chinese: 他现在在清华大学攻读电子物理学。

sentences.english: Processing and Application of Biodegradable Materials by Electrospinning , Tsinghua University , Ping Hu.
sentences.chinese: 生物分解材料的电纺丝加工与应用，清华大学，胡平。

sentences.english: The architectural image combines the children's interest and the traditional style of the Tsinghuayuan Garden.
sentences.chinese: 建筑形象结合了童趣与清华园传统的建筑风格。

sentences.english: Tsinghua these days is best known for engineering and applied science.
sentences.chinese: 如今的清华以工程学科和应用科学著称。

sentences.english: In 2015, Zhao started classes at National Tsing Hua University.
sentences.chinese: 2015年，赵慕鹤老人开始在国立清华大学上课。

sentences.english: Ma Yongliang is a professor with Tsinghua University's school of environment.
sentences.chinese: 马永亮是清华大学环境学院教授。

sentences.english: They ranked Tsinghua poorly in this area.
sentences.chinese: 清华在这方面的排名都较差。

sentences.english: Yunheng TONG, Deputy Dean of Economic and Management School, Tsinghua University.
sentences.chinese: 仝允桓，清华大学经济管理学院，副院长。

sentences.english: Qinghua , please open your door, I'm running to you now.
sentences.chinese: 清华，请打开你的门，我现在正向你跑去。

sentences.english: The following year, Visa admitted Tsinghua University, the girls became even sat with him.
sentences.chinese: 次年，老狼考上清华，那女孩竟然与他成了同桌。

sentences.english: The Universiade torch is expected to be lit at the prestigious Qinghua University in Beijing in April.
sentences.chinese: 本次大运会火炬将于4月在北京的清华大学点燃。

sentences.english: Why do you want to go to Tsinghua?

definition: Peking University (abbr. for 北京大學|北京大学)
Tsinghua or Qinghua University, Beijing/National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan
Peking University
